A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last jedi was far from expectations in terms of where we all thought the story might go. It feels like a star wars movie but in a refreshing way it also doesn't. Certain story arches in this movie are less interesting (Finn and Rose) and every once in a while the humor feels like too much. Other than those two complaints this movie is excellent and will keep you on the edge of your seat.
